child.tree-val: Eastern Sudanic, a subtree of Nilo-Saharan: Greenberg 1955
child.publications: Greenberg, Joseph H. 1955. The Eastern Sudanic Family. In Joseph H. Greenberg, Studies in African Linguistics Classification, 62-79. New Haven: The Compass Publishing Company.
child.pub-comments: Greenberg does not explicitly state whether he intends this to be a language or a subgroup. It has been interpreted in this tree to be a language, because the majority of scholars currently believe that Dinka and Nuer are separate languages.
